docs.title: DTE-S2GOS Python client
docs.text: Note, this software and its documentation is still in an early development stage.

docs.title: Changelog
docs.text: You can find the complete S2GOS client's changelog here.

docs.title: Reporting
docs.text: If you have suggestions, ideas, feature requests, or if you have identified a malfunction or error, then please post an issue.

docs.title: Contributions
docs.text:
The S2GOS client project welcomes contributions of any form as long as you respect our code of conduct and follow our contribution guide.

If you'd like to submit code or documentation changes, we ask you to provide a pull request (PR) here. For code and configuration changes, your PR must be linked to a corresponding issue.

docs.title: Development
docs.text:
To install theS2GOS client's development environment into an existing Python environment, do

pip install .[dev,doc]

or create a new environment using conda or mamba

mamba env create 
conda activate s2gos

docs.title: Testing and Coverage
docs.text:
The S2GOS client uses pytest for unit-level testing and code coverage analysis.

pytest tests/ --cov=s2gos --cov-report html

docs.title: Code Style
docs.text:
The S2GOS client's source code is formatted and quality-controlled using ruff:

ruff format
ruff check

docs.title: Documentation
docs.text:
The S2GOS client's documentation is built using the mkdocs tool.

With repository root as current working directory:

pip install .[doc]

mkdocs build
mkdocs serve
mkdocs gh-deploy

docs.title: License
docs.text: The S2GOS client is open source made available under the terms and conditions of the Apache 2.0 license.
